snippet: The Labor Department said weekly applications for unemployment aid dropped 11,000 last week to a seasonally adjusted 264,000.
abstract: Labor Dept reports weekly applications for unemployment aid fell to seasonally adjusted 264,000, lowest since July; unemployment rate is 5.1 percent, seven-year low.
lead_paragraph: The Labor Department said weekly applications for unemployment aid dropped 11,000 last week to a seasonally adjusted 264,000.

headline.print_headline: Weekly Unemployment Claims Drop to Lowest Since July
headline.main: Weekly Jobless Claims Drop to Lowest Since July
